Author: Microsoft Developer
Title: Bringing work context to your code in GitHub Copilot
Description:
Your favorite coding agent just got access to your work data in M365 thanks to a new MCP server for Work IQ. Check it out and show us what you build.

Unlock the knowledge in your business and bring it into your code with our preview of a new Work IQ MCP server

To learn more, head over to the blog: https://developer.microsoft.com/blog/bringing-work-context-to-your-code-in-github-copilot
